title: Elon Musk reportedly testified that he's low on cash and liquid assets
text:
Elon Musk has testified that he is “financially illiquid”, a lawyer for British diver Vernon Unsworth wrote in a legal filing, Bloomberg’s Dana Hull has reported.

Unsworth is suing Musk claiming defamation after the Tesla and SpaceX CEO called him a “pedo guy” on Twitter last year.

"I'm a f--ing idiot", billionaire Elon Musk said after doubling down on his attack on the British cave diver. AP

Musk’s tweet followed an interview in which Unsworth, who was involved in last year’s rescue of a youth soccer team and its coach from a cave in Thailand, said the miniature submarine Musk sent to Thailand to help with the rescue would have been ineffective and was merely a publicity stunt.

Musk later apologised to Unsworth and deleted the tweet.

A filing from Monday by Unsworth’s attorney refers to “Musk’s sworn testimony that he is financially illiquid”, according to Bloomberg’s report.
description: The Tesla CEO testified that he is “financially illiquid”, a lawyer for the British diver Vernon Unsworth wrote in a legal filing, it has been reported.
